alert.note: Alert for Hemphill; Roberts (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 17 at 6:27PM CDT until June 17 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL ROBERTS AND WEST CENTRAL HEMPHILL COUNTIES... At 626 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles northwest of Miami, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Roberts and west central Hemphill Counties. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
